body.name: Gitua Queen Size Bed Frame with Storage Drawers - Led Lights and Charging Station Metal Bed Frame with Headboard, No Box Spring Platform Bed Frame Wood, Vintage Brown
features: ONLY ONE PACKAGE & SIZE Just wait for one package, and you can receive this stylish and special bed frame. All accessories and assembly guide are in this package as well. There are available in two sizes for you to choose from, FULL SIZE: 81.5''L x 55.3''W x 40.6''H, max weight load: 1000 LBS, QUEEN SIZE: 86.6''L x 61.6''W x 40.6''H, max weight load: 1100 LBS. You can quickly find the right bed frame for your bedroom.

CHARGING STATION & 20 COLORS RGB LED LIGHTS The upgraded charging station contains 1 type-c port, 1 USB port, 2 US standard ports (to meet your multiple needs), combined with a 2-layer headboard design for storage, you can easily charge mobile devices such as phones and pads on headboard. Meanwhile, our bed frame is equipped with 20 colors of led light strips, you can adjust the bedroom atmosphere at will if you like.

4 FABRIC STORAGE DRAWERS The 4 storage drawers under the bed frame are ideal for organizing underwear, blankets, underwear, and child and baby clothes. Thick wood panels and a metal frame with reinforced welded joints make these drawers even stronger.

STABILITY & EASY TO ASSEMBLE The bed frame is built with a reinforced welded metal frame and wood slats, with 9 overall support points and silent footbeds. All accessories and assembly guide are in this package that is easy to assemble.

FRIENDLY CUSTOMER SERVICE If you have any problems after receiving your package (missing/damaged accessories/installation difficulties), please feel free to contact our customer service team and we will resolve your RETURN or REFUND within 24 hours.
body.description: Bed Frame with Storage Drawers Queen Size Specifications Our bed lets you turn the space you already use for sleeping into a smart place for storing. The 4 storage drawers under the bed frame are ideal for organizing underwear, blankets, underwear, and child and baby clothes. And that means you don't have to be super strong to get some super storage. Base drawers keep your items off the floor – helping them to stay clean and dust-free. The upgraded charging station contains 1 type-c port, 1 USB port, 2 US standard ports, combined with a 2-layer headboard design for storage, you can easily charge mobile devices such as phones and pads on headboard. Meanwhile, our bed frame is equipped with 20 colors of led light strips, you can adjust the bedroom atmosphere at will if you like. Product Overview: - Material: Wood + Steel - Display Dimensions： FULL SIZE: 81.5''L x 55.3''W x 40.6''H, Max Weight Load: 1000 LBS QUEEN SIZE: 86.6''L x 61.6''W x 40.6''H, Max Weight Load: 1100 LBS - Color: Rustic Brown / Vintage Brown What’s included: 1. Bed Frame 2. Headboard 3. Slats 4. Charging Station 5. LED Lights Care instructions: - Wipe dry with a clean cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Bed for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Awesome Bed, Just wish the Draws were Made of wood, instead of clothe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It looks just like the picture ! And very sturdy !
reviews.reviewText: I loved the frames after building them up it does take time to build took me about 3 hours following directions and making sure all was great .I don’t like how the under storage drawers work or lock into the frame that could have been the only design the company could have done better but with a little wiggle and lifting up it will lock and secure that’s the only down fall but great bed frame !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bed was definitely a mission to assemble but end game result a firm sturdy reliable bed frame and the lights included make for great ambiance i feel the drawers could have more space but they definitely hold enough room to put a quilt size blanket in a piece with convenient plugs its a great purchase only downside i see is that my cats can get under the bed from the headboard i rate a 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Somewhat challenging to assemble
reviews.reviewText: You hear all the IKEA jokes; I really think the instructions for this bed were inspired by IKEA jokes. We assembled, disassembled, and reassembled the bed sections multiple times. It took most of the day. The bed itself is a good platform bed. The lights are cute but glitchy and my granddaughter said she unplugged them. She likes the charging plugs being handy. The under the bed storage is flimsy. There are bolt holes that appear to be an option to fix the drawers to the bed, but no fasteners come with the kit. Overall, this is an inexpensive option for a platform bed and it holds the mattress fine. It looks good once assembled. It will try your patience to assemble it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cheapest bed I've ever bought. I have scars on my legs where the drawers cut me all the time. The top of the bed swallows your pillows because the mattress sinks thru the top of the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some issues, but a nice bed.
reviews.reviewText: I love the way it looks finished. It's just like the picture. I ran into some issues assembling it, but they were all manageable. The instructions have no words at all and some of the graphics don't tell you which way something should be facing, so I ended up having to undo and redo a couple steps. Wasn't really a big deal honestly. The metal tab on the drawer runner where you insert the wheel was bent in on exactly one piece and the hole for the screw was too long (excess metal) but with some leverage and a metal file I fixed those too and it worked great. My only real issue is the drawers being free to roll around under there... I expected some kind of track. I'm constantly straightening them after use. It's not a huge issue but a little annoying. Definitely got what I paid for. Overall, I like it. It's a nice bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: all in all a great sturdy bed my child loves this bed and wasnt very hard to build

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No where does it inform you that the draws are not sold. It's just some cardboard box cover with material.
